description.lang: legt fest, ob der alte Schalterwert nach Aus- und Einschalten wiederhergestellt wird.
Defines if the switch should restore switch state to the last state prior to device power off (power cycle).
Определяет восстанавливать ли состояние реле на то, которое было до отключения питания устройства.
Не восстанавливать. После подачи питания устройство будет в состоянии "Выключено"
Standard Alarm, Überflutungsalarm, Rauchalarm: CO, CO2, Temperaturalarm.
General alarm, flood alarm, smoke alarm: CO, CO2, temperature alarm.
Стандартный сигнал тревоги, тревога при протечки, тревога при задымлении, тревога при повышении температуры.
inaktiv - Gerät antwortet nicht auf Alarmzustand
INACTIVE - the device doesn't respond to alarm frames
Alarm An - Gerät schaltet an, wenn Alarm kommt (alle Kanäle auf 99%)
ALARM ON - the device turns on once alarm is detected (all channels set to 99%)
Alarm Aus - Gerät schaltet aus, wenn Alarm kommt (alle Kanäle auf 0%)
ALARM OFF - the device turns off once alarm is detected (all channels set to 0%)
Alarm Programm - Alarmzustand schaltet Alarm Sequenz (Programm festgelegt in Parameter 38)
ALARM PROGRAM - alarm sequence turns on (program selected in parameter 38)
Запустить специальную программу тревоги (выбор программы в параметре 38)

name.lang: Время между запусками специальной программы тревоги
Command class reporting Outputs status change
Команда отчета при изменении состояния Выходов

description.lang: Report als Folge von Aktionen des Eingangs und Controllers (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result of inputs and controllers actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Отчет при срабатывании входов и контроллеров (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Report als Folge von Aktionen des Eingangs (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Reporting as a result of inputs actions (SWITCH MULTILEVEL)
Report als Folge von Aktionen des Eingangs (COLOR CONTROL)
Reporting as a result of inputs actions (COLOR CONTROL)

name.lang: Report durch Änderung des Schwellenwertes des 0-10V Analog-Eingangs
Отчет при изменении аналогового сигнала (0-10В) на входах

description.lang: Parameter legt Wert fest, bei welcher Änderung der Eingangsspannung an Primärcontroller gemeldet wird. Neuer Wert wird aufgrund des letzten gemeldeten Wertes berechnet. 1-100 - (0.1-10V).
Parameter defines a value by which input voltage must change in order to be reported to the main controller. New value is calculated based on last reported value. 1-100 - (0.1-10V).
При каком изменении напряжения на входе нужно отправлять отчет контроллеру. Новое значение рассчитывается на основе предыдущего значения. 1-100 - (0.11В-10В)

name.lang: Report Frequenz (Zeit) bei Änderung des Stromverbrauches
Как часто отправлять отчет о потребляемой мощности

description.lang: Zeit zwischen Reports. Report wird gesendet, wenn der letzte gemeldete Wert vom aktuellen abweicht. Report wird ebenfalls beim Polling gesendet.
Time between reports. The report will be sent if last reported value differs from the current value, else reports will also be sent in case of polling.
Время между отчетами. Отчет будет отправлен, если последнее значение отличается от предыдущего, иначе отчет будет отправлен при опросе устройства.
Reports werden nicht gesendet. Reports werden nur beim Polling oder Ausschalten des Gerätes gesendet.
Reports are not sent. Reports will only be sent in case of polling or at turning OFF the device.
Не отправлять отчет. Отчет будет отправлен только при опросе устройства или если устройство выключится

name.lang: Report bei Änderung des Energieverbrauchs der gesteuerten Geräte.
Reporting changes in energy consumed by controlled devices.

description.lang: Neuer gemeldeter Wert wird berechnet mit letztem Wert als Grundlage. 1 - 254 (0,01kWh - 2,54kWh), 10 = 0.1kWh.
New reported energy value is calculated based on last reported value. 1 - 254 (0,01kWh - 2,54kWh), 10 = 0.1kWh.
Новое значение энергопотребления вычисляется суммированием с предыдущем значением. Доступные значения: 1-254 (0.01кВтч - 2.54кВтч)
Änderungen des Energieverbrauches werden nicht gemeldet. Reports werden nur beim Polling gemeldet.
changes in consumed energy will not be reported. Reports will be sent only in case of polling.
Не отправлять отчет. Отчет будет отправлен только при опросе устройства

name.lang: Antwort bei Änderung der Helligkeit auf 0%
Какой цвет установить если яркости стала 0%

description.lang: Beleuchtungfarbe wird auf Weiß gesetzt (Alle Kanäle werden zusammen gesteuert)
illumination colour set to white (all channels controlled together)
startet vordefiniertes Programm wenn Gerät im RGB/RGBW Mode aktiviert wird. (Parameter 14) - relevant wenn Primärcontroller nicht Home Center 2 ist.
Starting predefined program when device set to work in RGB/RGBW mode (parameter 14) - relevant for main controllers other than Home Center 2 only.
Запустить предустановленную световую программу, если устройство работает в RGB/RGBW режиме (параметр 14)
NODE INFO control frame is sent

wakeupNote.lang: Wake up interval (battery mode) Available settings: 0 or 5 - 86399 (in seconds, 5 s. to 24 hours) Default setting: 4 000 (each 66 minutes) Defines a time period, in seconds, by which a Flood Sensor will perform a “Wake up” instruction - communicate with main controller, update parameters, update software. Flood Sensor will wake up each defined time interval and will always attempt to connect with the main controller, without retrying if connection fails (thus preventing a battery from discharging when the Sensor is used at the range limit, in case of the main controller’s breakdown, or in case the sensor is taken away from the main controllers range). This parameter is relevant in case of battery operation - higher Wake up interval means the Sensor communicates less often saving a battery. After successful communication attempt, a sensor will go into standby mode, update parameters or will enter a software update mode. After failed communication attempt, a sensor will go into standby mode until another time interval will have elapsed. Wake Up Interval set to 0 disables sending WAKE UP frame. Device will not wake up automatically. To wake it up it is needed to manually press the TMPbutton, which will send Node Info frame.

inclusionNote.lang: Triple click TMP button.

description.lang: 3-rd Association Group reports the device status and allows for assigning single device only (the main controller by default - the device reports its status to the main controller).

2-nd Association Group is assigned to a TMP button and tilt sensor - ALARM GENERIC control frame will be sent to the associated devices in case a TMP button is released or a tilt sensor triggered (depending on parameter 74 settings)
1-st Association Group is assigned to the device status - sending the BASIC SET (default) or ALARM control frame to the associated devices.

Delays flood alarm cancelation for the device after flooding has ceased. Available settings: 0 - 3 600 (in seconds, each 1s) Determines time period, in seconds, by which a Flood Sensor will retain the flood state after the flooding itself, has ceased. Sensor will keep on reporting flooding to the main controller. This parameter settings do not affect acoustic and visual alarms, which turn off immediately after flooding ceases.

name.lang: Acoustic and visual signals On / Off in case of flooding

description.lang: The parameter allows for LED indicator and acoustic alarm deactivation in case of flooding detection. Available settings: 0 - acoustic and visual alarms inactive 1 - acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active 2 - acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive 3 - acoustic and visual alarms active. Changes in this parameter settings allow for increasing a battery life. Settings changes will not affect the Sensors communication with the main controller - commands to association groups, alarms and reports will still be sent.

name.lang: Type of alarm frame sent to 1-st association group (FLOOD)

description.lang: Available settings: 0 - ALARM WATER command frame 255 - BASIC SET command frame. The parameter determines a type of command frame sent by the Sensor in case flooding has been detected or cancelled. Default setting: 255

name.lang: Forced dimming level / roller blind opening level, when sending turn on / open command to 1-st association group devices

description.lang: In case of alarm frames, alarm priority is determined. Available settings: (1-99) or 255. The value of 255 allows for turning a device on. In case of a Dimmer it means turning it on with the last memorized state, e.g. Dimmer set to 30% and turned off, turned on again using 255 command is turned on with last state i.e. 30%. Default setting: 255

name.lang: Alarm cancelling or turning a device off (Basic) command frame deactivation.

description.lang: Allows for deactivating device turn off and alarm cancellation functions for the devices assigned to 1-st association group. Setting the parameter’s value to 0 results in stopping BASIC SET = 0 or ALARM WATER = 0 control frames from being sent. After sending flood alarm report the device will keep on reporting flooding after the flooding itself has ceased. Such a state can be cancelled by choosing alarm cancelation from the MENU, marked with green LED colour. Available settings: 0 - alarm (flooding) cancellation inactive 1 - alarm (flooding) cancellation active

Time interval, in seconds, between consecutive temperature measurements done by built in temperature sensor. New temperature value is reported to the main controller if it differs from the previously measured by hysteresis (defined in parameter 12). Available settings: 1 - 65535 (in seconds). The parameter determines time interval, in seconds, at which a Flood Sensor measures and reports ambient temperature and battery level. If a temperature value will differ from previously reported by a value determined in parameter 12 (e.g. P12 = 50, i.e. temperatures differ by 0,5°C), new temperature value will be reported. If a battery level changes, the device will report a battery status change - Battery Report. The parameter is relevant when using a Flood Sensor in a battery power mode - longer time interval means less frequent communication resulting in extended battery life. After consecutive FAILED and SUCCESSFUL communication attempts, the Sensor will go to standby mode.

Determines a minimum temperature change value (insensitivity level), resulting in a temperature report being sent to the main controller, according to the Parameter 10 settings. Available settings: 1 - 1 000 (each 0,01°C)

Value other than 0 means alarms are sent in BROADCAST mode (with a priority over other communicates), to all devices within the Fibaro Flood Sensor’s range. Available settings: 0 - broadcasts inactive 1 - flood (1-st Association Group) broadcast active, tamper (2-nd Association Group) broadcast inactive 2 - flood broadcast inactive, tamper broadcast active 3 - flood broadcast active, tamper broadcast active

The parameter stores a temperature value, below which LED indicator blinks with a colour determined by a Parameter 61 settings. By default the LED indicator blinks blue. Available settings: - 10 000 to +10 000 (each 0,01°C)

The parameter stores a temperature value, above which LED indicator blinks with a colour determined by the Parameter 62 settings. By default the LED indicator blinks red. Available settings: - 10 000 to +10 000 (each 0,01°C)
Parameter stores RGB colour value. Available settings: 0 - 16777215
Parameter stores RGB colour value. Available settings: 0 - 16777215

name.lang: Managing a LED indicator under standard operation

description.lang: Parameter determines LED indicator’s operation. Set to 0 turns the indicator off, saving a battery life. Available settings: 0 - LED indicator doesn’t indicate the temperature 1 - LED indicator indicates the temperature (blink) every Temperature Measurement Interval (Parameter 10, constant current and battery) or Wake Up Interval (battery mode) 2 - LED indicator indicates the temperature continuously, only in constant power mode.

Available settings: -10 000 to +10 000. Parameter stores a temperature value to be added to or deducted from the current temperature measured by internal temperature sensor in order to compensate the difference between air temperature and temperature at the floor level.

name.lang: Alarm frame sent to 2-nd Association Group activation

description.lang: Available settings: 0 - tamper alarms inactive 1 - button tamper alarm active 2 - movement tamper alarm active 3 - button and movement tampers alarm active. The device is able to turn on alarms resulting from sensor’s vibrations e.g. when the sensor is moved, or the TMP button released. 2-nd Association Group alarms are not cancelled.

The user can silence the Flood Sensor. Because the Sensor’s alarm may last for a long time, it’s possible to turn off visual and audible alarm signaling to save battery. Available settings: 0 - 65535 (each 1 second). The parameter determines a time period after which alarm will become “quiet” - still active but the device will go into battery saving mode. Visual or acoustic alarm will be reactivated after time period specified in the Parameter 76. When alarm status ceases, alarm will be turned off immediately. The value of 0 means visual and acoustic alarms are active indefinitely. In battery power mode the Sensor will never go to sleep which may shorten battery life significantly.

name.lang: Alarm frame / Basic Set frame retransmission time when retaining flood alarm

description.lang: Parameter determines a time period after which an alarm frame will be retransmitted. The value of 0 cancels an alarm frame retransmission. Available settings: 0 - 65535 (each 1 second).

Allows for turning of the internal flood sensor. Tamper and built in temperature sensor will remain active. Available settings: 0 - Default flood sensor operation (flood detection, reactions) 1 - Built in flood sensor TURNED OFF (doesn’t change its state in the main controller, doesn’t send Alarms and Basic Set frames with flood state changes. Always visible in the main controller as turned off)
Flood Sensor with Temp and Tilt
Датчик протечки со встроенным датчиком температуры и перемещения

wakeupNote.lang: Dreifaches schnelles Drücken der TMP-Taste im Gehäuseinneren
Triple clicking the TMP-Button inside the case
Тройное нажатие на кнопку TMP внутри корпуса

inclusionNote.lang: Dreifaches schnelles Drücken der TMP-Taste im Gehäuseinneren
Triple clicking the TMP-Button inside the case
Тройное нажатие на кнопку TMP внутри корпуса

description.lang: Flut Alarm mit BASIC Set Kommando
Для устройств управляемых датчиком протечки, отправляется BASIC SET или ALARM
Tilt Sensor alarm and TMP button events
Для устройств управляемых при срабатывании кнопки TMP и при срабатывании датчика наклона, отправляется ALARM GENERIC
Для контроллера, которому будут отправляться отчеты о состоянии устройства

name.lang: Через какое время после устранения протечки отключать сигнал тревоги

description.lang: Definiert wird die Verzögerungszeit, nach der der Alarm abgeschaltet wird, wenn das Flut wieder weg ist
Delays flood alarm cancelation for the device after flooding has ceased

Определяет период времени в секундах, в течение которого датчик протечки будет отправлять сигнал тревоги после исчезновения внешних аварийных факторов. Датчик в течение этого времени будет отчитываться главному контроллеру сети о своем аварийном состоянии. Значение этого параметра не влияет на звуковые и световые сигналы оповещения, действие которых прекращается немедленно после исчезновения внешних аварийных факторов.
Verzögerung in Sekunden (jeweils 1s); 0 (keine Verzögerung, direkte Beendigung des Alarms)
delay in seconds (each 1s); 0 (no delay, immediate alarm cancelation)

name.lang: Akustische und Optische Signale An/Aus bei Flut
Acoustic and visual signals On / Off in case of flooding
Звуковое и световое оповещение ВКЛ/ВЫКЛ при протечки

description.lang: legt fest, ob akustisches und/oder optisches Signal bei Flut aktiviert oder deaktiviert ist
parameter allows for LED indicator and acoustic alarm deactivation in case of flooding detection

Этот параметр позволяет отключать звуковое и световое оповещения в случае обнаружения протечки. Изменение значения этого параметра позволяет увеличить срок службы батареи датчика. Его изменения не влияют на связь датчика с главным контроллером сети. Команды для устройств из групп ассоциаций, отчеты о состоянии и аварийных ситуациях по-прежнему будет отправляться.
akustischer Alarm inaktiv, optischer Alarm aktiv
acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active
звуковое оповещение отключено, световое оповещение включено
akustischer Alarm aktiv, optischer Alarm inaktiv
acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive
звуковое оповещение включено, световое оповещение отключено

name.lang: Typ des Alarms für die 1. Assoziationsgruppe (Flut)
Type of alarm frame sent to 1-st association group (FLOOD)
Тип сигнала тревоги для устройств из группы №1 (Протечка)

description.lang: legt fest, welches Kommando vom Sensor bei Flut oder Flutende gesendet wird
parameter determines a type of command frame sent by the Sensor in case flooding has been detected or cancelled
Параметр определяет тип сигнала тревоги, посылаемого датчиком в случае обнаружения протечки или его отмены.

name.lang: prozentuales Niveau beim Senden an erste Assoziationsgruppe
Forced dimming level sent to 1-st association group devices
Уровень диммирования/процент открытия жалюзи, отправляемый устройствам из группы №1

description.lang: legt fest, welches Niveau ein Dimmer oder eine Jalousie beim Senden die erste Assoziationsgruppe erhält
Forced dimming level / roller blind opening level, when sending turn on / open
Значение 255 включит диммер на последний установленный уровень, значение 30 включит диммер на 30%.

name.lang: Aktivieren oder deaktivieren der Alarmmeldung nach Ende der Flut
Alarm cancelling or turning a device off (Basic) command frame deactivation
Отмена “Отключение сигнала тревоги” или “Отправка команды ВЫКЛ” для устройств из группы №1

description.lang: Blockiert oder lässt zu, dass die Alarmmeldung nach Flutende abgeschaltet wird
Allows for deactivating device turn off and alarm cancellation functions for the devices assigned to 1-st association group

Значение параметра, равное 0, приводит к отмене отправки сообщений BASIC SET = 0 или ALARM WATER = 0. То есть, после возникновения аварийной ситуации устройство будет продолжать отправку сигнала тревоги даже, если все внешние аварийные факторы прекратили свое действие. Такой режим работы может быть в дальнейшем отключен через МЕНЮ, отмеченное зеленым светодиодом.
Zeit-Intervalle, in Sekunden, zwischen den Temperaturmessungen
Time interval, in seconds, between consecutive temperature measurements

Временной интервал, в секундах, через который будут проводиться измерения температуры воздуха внутренним температурным датчиком. Измеренное значение будет передано главному контроллеру сети в случае, если оно изменилось по сравнению с предыдущим на величину, большую, чем гистерезис (определяется параметром №12). Этот параметр определяет величину временного интервала, через который Fibaro Flood Sensor будет измерять температуру окружающего воздуха и уровень заряда батареи, а затем отправлять их значения на главный контроллер. Если измеренная температура отличается от измеренной ранее на величину большую, чем определяемая параметром №12 (например, P12 = 50, то есть, гистерезис равен 0.5°С), то на контроллер будет отправлено новое значение температуры. Если уровень заряда батареи изменяется, его новая величина отправляется на контроллер посредством отчета Battery Report. Значение этого параметра чрезвычайно важно в режиме работы от батареек – больший период измерения означает менее частые сеансы связи, что увеличивает срок службы батареек. После последовательных НЕУДАВШЕЙСЯ и УДАВШЕЙСЯ попыток связи датчик переходит в режим ожидания.

name.lang: Отчет при изменении температуры на определенную величину (гистерезис)

description.lang: definiert den Temperaturunterschied, bei dem ein Temperaturreport gesendet wird
Determines a minimum temperature change value (insensitivity level), resulting in a temperature report being sent
Этот параметр определяет величину температуры, при изменении на которую отправляется отчет главному контроллеру сети, в соответствии со значением параметра №10.
Werte außer 0 führen zum Aussenden eines BROADCAST (mit höherer Priorität als alle anderen Sendungen) an alle Geräte in direkter Reichweite des Senders
Value other than 0 means alarms are sent in BROADCAST mode (with a priority over other communicates), to all devices within the Sensor’s range

Значения параметра, отличное от 0, означает, что все сигналы тревоги будут посылаться широковещательно (BROADCAST) всем устройствам в зоне действия радиосвязи датчика Fibaro Flood Sensor (с приоритетом над другими пересылаемыми сообщениями).
Flut (1. Assoziationsgruppe) broadcast aktiv; Schutzschalter (2. Assoziationsgruppe) broadcast inaktiv
flood (1-st Association Group) broadcast active; tamper (2-nd Association Group) broadcast inactive
широковещательное оповещение о затоплении (для группы №1) включено, широковещательное сообщения о сработке темпера (для группы №2) выключено
Flut broadcast inaktiv; Schutzschalter broadcast aktiv
flood broadcast inactive; tamper broadcast active
широковещательное оповещение о затоплении выключено, широковещательное сообщения о сработке темпера включено
Flut broadcast aktiv; Schutzschalter broadcast aktiv
flood broadcast active; tamper broadcast active
широковещательное оповещение о затоплении включено, широковещательное сообщения о сработке темпера включено
Temperatur-Wert unter dem die Anzeige LED mit einstellbarer Farbe blinkt
parameter stores a temperature value, below which LED indicator blinks with a definable colour
Этот параметр определяет значение температуры, ниже которой светодиодный индикатор будет мигать цветом, определяющимся параметром №61. По умолчанию светодиодный индикатор мигает синим цветом.
Temperatur-Wert über dem die Anzeige LED mit einstellbarer Farbe blinkt
parameter stores a temperature value, above which LED indicator blinks with a definable colour
Этот параметр определяет значение температуры, выше которой светодиодный индикатор будет мигать цветом, определяющимся параметром №62. По умолчанию светодиодный индикатор мигает красным цветом.

name.lang: Low temperature alarm indicator LED colour
Цвет светодиодного индикатора, предупреждающего о низкой температуре

description.lang: Главный контроллер сети воспринимает цвет как сумму значений его компонент (в формате RGB). Каждому цвету при этом соответствует значение от 0 до 255. Пример: Цвет индикатора= 65536 * КРАСНЫЙ + 256 * ЗЕЛЕНЫЙ + СИНИЙ
255 (blue 0x000000FF) Colour: Red = 16711680 Green = 65280 Blue = 255 Yellow = 16776960 Turquoise = 65535 Orange = 16750848 White = 16777215 LED indicator turned off = 0

name.lang: High temperature alarm indicator LED colour
Цвет сигнального индикатора, предупреждающего о высокой температуре

description.lang: Главный контроллер сети воспринимает цвет как сумму значений его компонент (в формате RGB). Каждому цвету при этом соответствует значение от 0 до 255. Пример: Цвет индикатора= 65536 * КРАСНЫЙ + 256 * ЗЕЛЕНЫЙ + СИНИЙ
16711680 (red 0x00FF0000) Colour: Red = 16711680 Green = 65280 Blue = 255 Yellow = 16776960 Turquoise = 65535 Orange = 16750848 White = 16777215 LED indicator turned off = 0

name.lang: Managing a LED indicator under standard operation
Управление светодиодным индикатором в стандартных условиях эксплуатации

description.lang: Parameter legt die Funktion der Anzeige LED fest. Wert 0 deaktiviert die LED um Strom zu sparen
Parameter determines LED indicator’s operation. Set to 0 turns the indicator off, saving a battery life
Этот параметр определяет режим работы светодиодного индикатора. Если установить параметру значения «0», то светодиод отключится, сохраняя заряд батареи.
LED Anzeige zeigt keine Temperatur an
LED indicator doesn’t indicate the temperature
LED Anzeige zeigt die Temperatur und blinkt bei jeder Temperatur-Messung (Parameter 10, Netzbetrieb und Batteriebetrieb) oder Wake Up Interval (Batteriebetrieb)
LED indicator indicates the temperature (blink) every Temperature Measurement Interval (Parameter 10, constant current and battery) or Wake Up Interval (battery mode)

Светодиодный индикатор отображает температуру (мигает) на каждом интервале измерения температуры (параметр №10, питание от батареи или от блока питания) или каждом интервале пробуждения (в режиме работы от батареи).
LED Anzeige zeigt die Temperatur fortlaufend an, nur im Batteriebetrieb
LED indicator indicates the temperature continuously, only in constant power mode
Светодиодный индикатор постоянно отображает температуру. Этот режим доступен только при питании устройства от блока питания.
Parameter speichert Temperaturwert, der vom Messwert addiert oder subtrahiert wird, um Messabweichungen auszugleichen
Parameter stores a temperature value to be added to or deducted from the current temperature measured to compensate temperature deflection

Этот параметр хранит в себе значение температуры, которая должна быть добавлена (или вычтена, в зависимости от знака) к температуре, измеряемой внутренним температурным датчиком. Эта коррекция необходима для того, чтобы учесть разницу температур воздуха на уровне пола и на уровне датчика.

name.lang: Alarm frame sent to 2-nd Association Group activation
Отключение сигнала тревоги для устройств из группы №2

description.lang: Parameter legt fest, welche Sensoren einen Alarm an die 2. Assoziationsgruppe senden
parameter to device wich sensors send Alarm to 2. association group

Настройка данного параметра позволяет включить отправку сигналов, оповещающих о вибрациях датчика (например, при его перемещениях) или о отжатии кнопки TMP (вскрытие). Сигналы тревоги для группы №2 при этом не отключаются.
Отключение оповещений о перемещении датчика и вскрытии
button and movement tampers alarm active
Включение оповещений о перемещении датчика и вскрытии
Parameter legt fest, nach welcher Dauer der optische und akustische Alarm endet
parameter determines a time period after which visual and audible alarm will become “quiet”

При желании пользователь может отключить звуковое оповещение датчика Fibaro Flood Sensor. Это обуславливается тем, что оповещение об аварийной ситуации может продолжаться в течение долгого периода времени, а своевременное отключение звуковых и световых сигналов позволит сохранить заряд батареи устройства. Значение этого параметра определяет длительность периода времени, после которого сигнализация датчика перейдет в «тихий» режим (оповещение об аварийной ситуации продолжается, однако устройство переходит в режим экономии заряда батареи). Звуковые и световые сигналы оповещения будут выключены по прошествии времени, указанном в параметре №76. Сигнал тревоги отключится сразу же как только будет устранена аварийная ситуацию. Значение этого параметра 0 означает, что звуковые и световые сигналы оповещения не будут отключаться, пока существует аварийная ситуация. В режиме работы от батареи, в этом случае, устройство не будет переходить в спящий режим, что может значительно сократить заряд батареи. Значение этого параметра игнорируется, если значение параметра №2 равно 0.
Wert 0 bedeutet optischer und akustischer Alarm werden nicht beendet
value of 0 means visual and acoustic alarms are active indefinitely
в секундах, 0 - тревога не будет отключаться

name.lang: Alarm Frame/Basic Set Frame Zeit für erneutes Aussenden bei anhaltender Flut
Alarm frame / Basic Set frame retransmission time when retaining flood alarm
Величина задержки перед повторной отправкой сигнала оповещения (Alarm или Basic Set)

description.lang: Parameter legt fest, nach welcher Zeit ein Alarm Frame erneut ausgesendet wird
Parameter determines a time period after which an alarm frame will be retransmitted

Значение этого параметра определяет, через какой интервал времени по сети будет послан повторный сигнал оповещения об аварийной ситуации. Значение 0 означает, что сигнал оповещения посылаться не будет. В случае если интервал времени в этом параметре будет установлен меньшим, чем в параметре №75, устройство никогда не остановит передачу сигнала самостоятельно, оповещение будет работать всегда.
Wert 0 deaktiviert das erneute Aussenden des Alarms
value of 0 cancels an alarm frame retransmission
в секундах, 0 - тревога не будет отправляться
Aktivieren/Deaktivieren des internen Flutsensors. Schutzschalter und Temperatursensor bleiben aktiv
Allows for turning off the internal flood sensor. Tamper and built in temperature sensor will remain active.
Этот параметр позволяет настроить режим работы датчика протечки. Значение этого параметра не влияет на работу встроенного датчика перемещения и температурного датчика – они будут работать всегда.
Default flood sensor operation (flood detection, reactions)
Flutsensor deaktiviert (Status im Controller ändert sich nicht, sendet keine Alarme und Basic Set Frames mit Änderungen des Flutstatus. Anzeige im Controller immer "Aus")

Built in flood sensor TURNED OFF (doesn’t change its state in the main controller, doesn’t send Alarms and Basic Set frames with flood state changes. Always visible in the main controller as turned off)

inclusionNote.lang: Triple click the TMP button, located inside Flood Sensor’s casing.

description.lang: “Tamper Alarm” is assigned to a TMP button and tilt sensor - sending the NOTIFICATION REPORT control frame to the associated devices in case a TMP button is released or a tilt sensor triggered (depending on parameter 74 settings).
“Flood Alarm” is assigned to the device status - sending the NOTIFICATION REPORT control frame to the associated devices.
“Flood Control” is assigned to the device status - sending the BASIC SET control frame to the associated devices.

Determines time period, in seconds, by which a Flood Sensor will retain the flood state after the flooding itself, has ceased. Sensor will keep on reporting flooding to the main controller. This parameter settings do not affect acoustic and visual alarms, which turn off immediately after flooding ceases.
Define the time period for retaining the flood state.

name.lang: Acoustic and visual signals On / Off in case of flooding

description.lang: The parameter allows for LED indicator and acoustic alarm deactivation in case of flooding detection. Changes in this parameter settings allow for increasing a battery life. Settings changes will not affect the Sensors communication with the main controller - commands to association groups, alarms and reports will still be sent.
acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active
acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive

name.lang: Forced dimming level / roller blind opening level, when sending turn on / open command to 2nd association group devices

description.lang: In case of alarm frames, alarm priority is determined. The value of 255 allows for turning a device on. In case of a Dimmer it means turning it on with the last memorized state, e.g. Dimmer set to 30% and turned off, turned on again using 255 command is turned on with last state i.e. 30%.

name.lang: Alarm cancelling or turning a device off (Basic) command frame deactivation

description.lang: Allows for deactivating device turn off and alarm cancellation functions for the devices assigned to 2nd and 3rd association group. Setting the parameter’s value to 0 results in stopping BASIC SET = 0 and ALARM WATER = 0 control frames from being sent. After sending flood alarm report the device will keep on reporting flooding after the flooding itself has ceased. Such a state can be cancelled by choosing alarm cancelation from the MENU, marked with green LED colour.

The parameter determines time interval, in seconds, at which a Flood Sensor measures and reports ambient temperature and battery level. If a temperature value will differ from previously reported by a value determined in parameter 12 (e.g. P12 = 50, i.e. temperatures differ by 0,5oC), new temperature value will be reported. If a battery level changes, the device will report a battery status change - Battery Report.
Define a time interval for consecutive temperature measurements.
Determines a minimum temperature change value (insensitivity level), resulting in a temperature report being sent to the main controller, according to the Parameter 10 settings.
Define the minimum temperature change value.
The parameter stores a temperature value, below which LED indicator blinks with a colour determined by a Parameter 61 settings. By default the LED indicator blinks blue.
The parameter stores a temperature value, above which LED indicator blinks with a colour determined by the Parameter 62 settings. By default the LED indicator blinks red.

A main controller interprets colours as a sum of it component colours value. Each colours value is a number from 0 to 255.
Example: Indicated colour = 65536 * RED value + 256 * GREEN value + BLUE value Colour Red=16711680 Green=65280 Blue=255 Yellow=16776960 Turquoise=65535 Orange=16750848 White=16777215

A main controller interprets colours as a sum of it component colours value. Each colours value is a number from 0 to 255.
Example: Indicated colour = 65536 * RED value + 256 * GREEN value + BLUE value Colour Red=16711680 Green=65280 Blue=255 Yellow=16776960 Turquoise=65535 Orange=16750848 White=16777215

name.lang: Managing a LED indicator under standard operation

description.lang: Parameter determines LED indicator’s operation. Set to 0 turns the indicator off, saving a battery life.
LED indicator doesn’t indicate the temperature
LED indicator indicates the temperature (blink) every Temperature Measurement Interval (Parameter 10, constant current and battery) or Wake Up Interval (battery mode)
LED indicator indicates the temperature continuously, only in constant power mode

Parameter stores a temperature value to be added to or deducted from the current temperature measured by internal temperature sensor in order to compensate the difference between air temperature and temperature at the floor level.
Define a temperature value for adjustment.

name.lang: Alarm frame sent to 1st and 4th Association Group activation

description.lang: The device is able to turn on alarms resulting from sensor’s vibrations e.g. when the sensor is moved, or the TMP button released.
button and movement tampers alarm active

The parameter determines a time period after which alarm will become “quiet” - still active but the device will go into battery saving mode. Visual or acoustic alarm will be reactivated after time period specified in the Parameter 76. When alarm status ceases, alarm will be turned off immediately. The value of 0 means visual and acoustic alarms are active indefinitely. In battery power mode the Sensor will never go to sleep which may shorten battery life significantly.
NOTE The parameter is ignored when Parameter 2 is set to 0.
Define a time period for silencing the alarm.

name.lang: Alarm frame / Basic Set frame retransmission time when retaining flood alarm

description.lang: Parameter determines a time period after which an alarm frame will be retransmitted. The value of 0 cancels an alarm frame retransmission.
Define the time period for retransmitting the alarm frame.
Allows for turning of the internal flood sensor. Tamper and built in temperature sensor will remain active.
Default flood sensor operation (flood detection, reactions)

Built in flood sensor TURNED OFF (doesn’t change its state in the main controller, doesn’t send Alarms and Basic Set frames with flood state changes. Always visible in the main controller as turned off)

name.lang: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode

description.lang: This parameter defines how commands are sent in specified association groups: as secure or non-secure. Parameter is active only in Z-Wave network security mode. It does not apply to 1st Lifeline group. Parameter values may be combined, e.g. 1+2=3 means that 2nd & 3rd group are sent as secure.
0 - none of the groups sent as secure 1 - 2nd group ”Flood Control” sent as secure 2 - 3rd group ”Flood Alarm” sent as secure 4 - 4th group „Tamper” sent as secure

wakeupNote.lang: Triple click B-button.

inclusionNote.lang: Press the B-button once.

description.lang: 3-rd Association Group reports the device status and allows for assigning a single device only (the main controller by default - the device reports its status to the main controller). It’s not recommended to modify this association group.
2-nd Association Group is assigned to the TMP button and the malfunction alarm. Alarm frame will be sent to the associated devices once tampering or malfunction are detected.
1-st Association Group is assigned to the device status - Sending the BASIC SET (default) or ALARM control frame to the associated devices having detected fire

The time between when the smoke disappears and the Fibaro Smoke Sensor stops sending the alarm signal. Available settings: 0 – 17280, 65535 (5s multiplier) [5s-24h] 0 - no delay, immediate cancellation 65535 - alarm cancellation inactive - Smoke Sensor will keep indicating smoke alarm after the smoke will have disappeared. The smoke alarm can be only ceased manually, by entering 2nd menu level

name.lang: LED indicator and acoustic alarm turned ON / OFF at any alarm type.

description.lang: Allows for deactivating the LED indicator and the acoustic alarm, in case of detecting an alarm of any type. This doesn’t affect the communication with the Z-Wave network controller, i.e. the sensor will keep sending alarms, reports and all information to the associated devices. Modifying this parameter settings helps extending the battery life.
acoustic alarm inactive, visual alarm active
acoustic alarm active, visual alarm inactive

name.lang: Type of alarm frame sent to 1-st Association Group devices (smoke alarm).

description.lang: Allows for choosing a command class used in 1-st Association Group. Available settings: 0, 255

name.lang: Forced level of dimming / opening dimmers, roller blinds etc. devices at sending turn on / open / change level commands to 1-st Association Group’s devices.

description.lang: The value of 255 allows for turning on a device. In case of Dimmer, the value of 255 means turning on the device with the last memorized state. E.g. Dimmer set to 30% and then turned off, and next turned on using the 255 command, will turn on with the last remembered status, i.e. 30%. In case of alarm frames, alarm priority is defined. Available settings: (1 - 99) or 255
Set the forced level of dimming/opening devices.

Time interval between consecutive temperature reports. The parameter is relevant for the battery powering mode only. Longer time interval means less frequent communication and thus a longer battery life. Report is sent when new temperatue value is different from the one previously reported. Temperature reports can be also sent as a result of polling. Available settings: 1 – 17280, 0 (multiply by 5 seconds) [5s-24h]

The temperature report will only be sent if there is a difference in temperature value from the previous value reported, defined in this parameter (hysteresis). Temperature reports can be also sent as a result of polling. Available settings: 0 – 100 (in 0,1°C steps) Default setting: 20 (2°C)
The temperature change reporting function is inactive.
Define delta T for a temperature report.

Parameter stores a temperature value to be added to or deducted from the current temperature measured by internal temperature sensor in order to compensate the difference between air temperature and temperature measured at the ceiling level. Available settings: -1000 -/+ 1000 (in 0,1°C steps)

Time period between the consecutive Z-Wave network range tests. In battery powering mode, Z-Wave network range test is carried out at the wake up interval. The value of 0 turns off the Z-Wave range test, regardless of the powering mode chosen. Available settings: 0 – 144 (10min multiplier) [10min-24h] Default setting: 1 (10min)
Z-Wave network range test is inactive.
Set the time interval for Z-Wave network range tests.
Temperature value, measured by the built-in temperature sensor, above which the temperature alarm is sent.
There are 3 levels of sensitivity to smoke presence. Level 1 means the highest sensitivity.

This parameter allows for specifying the moment in which the Black Box starts recording data. After the specified smoke and temperature values will be exceeded, the Fibaro Smoke Sensor’s Black Box will record them.
Time interval in which malfuntion alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms. Available settings: 1 - 255 (100 ms multiplier) [100ms-25,5s]
Time interval in which temperature alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms. Available settings: 1 - 255 (100 ms multiplier) [100ms-25,5s]

name.lang: Lack of the Z-Wave range alarm

description.lang: Time interval in which lack of the Z-Wave network alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms. Available settings: 1 - 17280 (5s multiplier) [5s-24h] Default setting: 360 (30min)
Time interval in which low battery alarm, if detected, is repeated using visual and acoustic alarms. Available settings: 1 - 17280 (5s multiplier) [5s-24h] Default setting: 360 (30min)

name.lang: Consider temperature measurement compensation (parameter 73) when sending temperature report.

description.lang: The parameter defines the state of the tamper alarm.
tamper alarm active, with cancellation option available
tamper alarm active, without cancellation option
A value other than 0 means that alarms are being sent in broadcast mode, i.e. to all devices within a Fibaro Smoke Sensor’s range.
smoke alarm broadcast (1-st Association Group) active; tamper alarm broadcast (2-nd Association Group) inactive
smoke alarm broadcast (1-st Association Group) inactive; tamper alarm broadcast (2-nd Association Group) active
smoke alarm broadcast active (1-st association group); tamper alarm broadcast (2-nd association group) active

inclusionNote.lang: Quickly, triple click the B-button, located on Fibaro Smoke Sensor’s enclosure.

description.lang: Tamper. Sending ALARM SENSOR REPORT notification (TYPE = GENERAL) to associated devices once enclosure opening is detected.
Fire Alarm. Sending the notification ALARM SENSOR REPORT (TYPE = SMOKE ALARM) to associated devices once smoke is detected.
Tamper. Sending the notification NOTIFICATION REPORT (TYPE = BURGLAR, EVENT = PRODUCT COVERING REMOVED) to associated devices once enclosure opening is detected.
Fire Alarm. Sending the BASIC SET control command once smoke is detected.
There are 3 levels of sensitivity to smoke presence. Level 1 means the highest sensitivity. Rising the parameter value lowers the sensitivity to smoke presence.
This parameter allows to activate excess temperature and/or enclosure opening notifications sent to the main controller.

Parameter values may be combined, e.g. 1+2=3, means that all notifications are enabled. 0 - all notifications disabled 1 - enclosure opening notification enabled 2 - exceeding temperature threshold notification enabled
This parameter allows to activate visual indications but does not apply to major alarms, such as FIRE, TROUBLE and LOW BATTERY ALARM.

Parameter values may be combined, e.g. 1+2+4=7, means that all notifications are enabled. 0 - all notifications disabled 1 - enclosure opening notification enabled 2 - exceeding temperature threshold notification enabled 4 - lack of Z-Wave range notification
This parameter allows to activate sound signals but does not apply to major alarms, such as FIRE, TROUBLE and LOW BATTERY ALARM.

Parameter values may be combined, e.g. 1+2+4=7, means that all notifications are enabled. 0 - all notifications disabled 1 - enclosure opening notification enabled 2 - exceeding temperature threshold notification enabled 4 - lack of Z-Wave range notification

name.lang: Configuration of control frames in BASIC command class

description.lang: This parameter defines which frames will be sent in the 2-nd Association Group (FIRE ALARM). The values of BASIC ON and BASIC OFF frames may be defined as described in further parameters.
BASIC ON frame is sent in case of smoke presence detection and FIRE ALARM triggering. Its value is defined by the parameter.
BASIC OFF frame is sent in case of FIRE ALARM cancellation. Its value is defined by the parameter.

A value other than 0 means that alarms are being sent in broadcast mode, i.e. to all devices within a Fibaro Smoke Sensor’s range. Operating in Z-Wave network security mode automatically disables sending alarms in broadcast mode.
FIRE ALARM broadcast (2-nd & 4-th Association Group) active; enclosure opening notification broadcast (3-rd & 5-th Association Group) inactive.
FIRE ALARM broadcast (2-nd & 4-th Association Group) inactive; enclosure opening notification broadcast (3-rd & 5-th Association Group) active.
FIRE ALARM broadcast (2-nd & 4-th Association Group) active; enclosure opening notification broadcast (3-rd & 5-th Association Group) active.

name.lang: Associations in Z-Wave network security mode

description.lang: This parameter defines how commands are sent in specified association groups: as secure or non-secure. Parameter is active only in Z-Wave network security mode. It doesn’t apply to 1st Lifeline group.

Parameter values may be combined, e.g. 1+2=3 means that 2nd & 3rd group are sent as secure. 0 - all groups sent as non-secure 1 - 2nd group sent as secure 2 - 3rd group sent as secure 4 - 4th group sent as secure 8 - 5th group sent as secure

Time interval between consecutive temperature reports. Report is sent when new temperature value is different from the one previously reported - according to the set hysteresis (parameter 21). Temperature reports can be also sent as a result of polling. Available settings: 0, 1-8640 (multiply by 10 seconds) [10s-24h]

The temperature report will only be sent if there is a difference in temperature value from the previous value reported, defined in this parameter (hysteresis). Temperature reports can be also sent as a result of polling. Available settings: 1 – 100 (in 0,1°C steps)
Define the difference in temperature value for reports being sent.
Temperature value measured by the built-in temperature sensor above which the excess temperature notification is sent (visual indication/sound/Z-Wave report).
Time interval of signaling (visual indication/sound) excess temperature level Available settings: 1-8640 (multiply by 10 seconds) [10s-24h]

name.lang: Lack of Z-Wave range indication interval

description.lang: Time interval of signaling (visual indication/sound) lack of Z-Wave range Available settings: 1-8640 (multiply by 10 seconds) [10s-24h]

wakeupNote.lang: gleichzeitiges 5 sek langes Drücken aller 4 Tasten und anschließend Button 2
Simultaneously press four buttons for 5 seconds and then button 2
pression simultanée de 5 secondes à tous les 4 boutons et après bouton numéro 2

pression simultanée de 5 secondes à tous les 4 boutons et après bouton numéro 1
Одновременное нажатие 4 кнопок на 5 секунд и далее кнопка 1

description.lang: Wird gesteuert durch Taste 1 oder einfache Klicks auf Taste 1 und 3
Controlled by button 1 or single clicks of buttons 1 and 3
est controllée par bouton 1 ou clics simples sur bouton 1 et 3
Управляется кнопкой 1 или одинарными нажатиями кнопок 1 и 3
Wird gesteuert durch Taste 2 oder einfache Klicks auf Taste 2 und 4
Controlled by button 2 or single clicks of buttons 2 and 4
est controllée par bouton 2 ou clics simples sur bouton 2 et 4
Управляется кнопкой 2 или одинарными нажатиями кнопок 2 и 4
Wird gesteuert durch Taste 3 oder zwei Klicks auf Taste 1 und 3
Controlled by button 3 or double clicks of buttons 1 and 3
est controllée par bouton 3 ou deux clics sur bouton 1 et 3
Управляется кнопкой 3 или двойными нажатиями кнопок 1 и 3
Wird gesteuert durch Taste 4 oder zwei Klicks auf Taste 2 und 4
Controlled by button 4 or double clicks of buttons 2 and 4
est controllée par bouton 4 ou deux clics sur bouton 2 et 4
Управляется кнопкой 4 или двойными нажатиями кнопок 2 и 4
Im entkoppelten Modus steuert Taste 1 die Gruppe 1 und Taste 3 die Gruppe 3, im gekoppelten Modus steuern beide die Gruppen 1 und 3, wobei Einfachklick Gruppe 1 und Doppelklick Gruppe 3 schaltet.

In separate mode button 1 works with group 1, button 3 with groups 3. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 1/3 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 1, double click with group 3.
Au mode découplé, le bouton 1 contrôle le groupe 1 et bouton 3 le groupe 3, en mode accouplé les deux contrôlent les groupes 1 et 3, ou clic simple couple groupe 1 et clic double groupe 3.

В раздельном режиме кнопка 1 работает с группой 1, кнопка 3 с группой 3. Нажатие - Вкл, удержание - диммирование Вверх, двойное нажатие - Выкл, нажатие-удержание - Вниз. В парном режиме 1/3 - Вверх/Вниз соответственно. Клик - Вкл/Выкл, удержания - диммирование Вверх/Вниз. Одинарный клик работает с группой 1, двойной с группой 3.
Taste 1 und 3 steuern gemeinsam, Doppelklick wird nicht beachtet
bouton 1 et 3 contrôlent ensemble, clic double n'existe pas
Taste 1 und 3 steuern gemeinsam, Doppelklick wird beachtet
boutons 1 et 3 contrôlent ensemble, clic double existe
Im entkoppelten Modus steuert Taste 2 die Gruppe 2 und Taste 4 die Gruppe 4, im gekoppelten Modus steuern beide die Gruppen 2 und 4, wobei Einfachklick Gruppe 2 und Doppelklick Gruppe 4 schaltet.

In separate mode button 2 works with group 2, button 4 with groups 4. Click is On, Hold is dimming Up, Double click is Off, Click-Hold is dimming Down. In pair button 2/4 are Up/Down correspondingly. Click is On/Off, Hold is dimming Up/Down. Single clicks works with group 2, double click with group 4.
Au mode découplé, le bouton 2 contrôle le groupe 2 et bouton 4 le groupe 4, en mode accouplé les deux contrôlent les groupes 2 et 4, ou clic simple couple groupe 2 et clic double groupe 4.

В раздельном режиме кнопка 2 работает с группой 2, кнопка 4 с группой 4. Нажатие - Вкл, удержание - диммирование Вверх, двойное нажатие - Выкл, нажатие-удержание - Вниз. В парном режиме 2/4 - Вверх/Вниз соответственно. Клик - Вкл/Выкл, удержания - диммирование Вверх/Вниз. Одинарный клик работает с группой 2, двойной с группой 4.
Taste 2 und 4 steuern gemeinsam, Doppelklick wird nicht beachtet
bouton 2 et 4 contrôlent ensemble, clic double n'existe pas
Taste 2 und 4 steuern gemeinsam, Doppelklick wird beachtet
boutons 2 et 4 contrôlent ensemble, clic double existe
Dieser Parameter definiert das Schaltkommando, das an Geräte in Assoziationsgruppe 1 gesendet wird.

In Switch On/Off only mode On command is sent on Dim Up, Off on Dim Down. In Scenes mode the scene ID sent is (10 * group + ActionID), where ActionID is: 1 = On, 2 = Off, 3 = Dim Up Start, 4 = Dim Down Start, 5 = Dim Up Stop, 6 = Dim Down Stop
Ce paramètre défini le commando manoeuvre, lequel est envoyé aux appareils de goupe d'association 1.

В режиме Только Включать/Выключать при диммировании Вверх отправляется команда Включить, Вниз - команда Выключить. В режиме Сцен номер сцены вычисляется так: (10 * группа + ActionID), где ActionID это: 1 - Вкл, 2 = Выкл, 3 = Начало диммирования Вверх, 4 = Начало диммирования Вниз, 5 = Окончание диммирования Вверх, 6 = Окончание диммирования Вниз. Пример: в режиме "В паре без двойных кликов" при нажатии на кнопку 1 (группа 1) отправится команда 10 * 1 + 1(Вкл) = 11.

description.lang: Die Konfigurationsoption 1 wird verwendet um die Farbtemperatur der RGBW Birne zu regulieren. Mit den Werten von 0 - 100, wobei 0 ein starkes Weiß und 100 ein warmes Weiß darstellt, können die verschiedenen Temperaturen gesteuert werden.
Configuration option 1 is used to adjust color temperature. Values range from 0 to 100 where 0 means full cold white and 100 means full warm white.
Der Konfigurationsparameter 2 wird verwendet um die Empfindlichkeit des Schocksensors zu regulieren.
Configuration option 2 is used to adjust shock sensor sensitivity. Values range from 0 to 31 where 0 means minimum sensitivity and 31 means maximum sensitivity.

Press On/Off button three times within 1.5 seconds
Трижды нажмите на кнопку Вкл/Выкл в течении 1.5 секунд

deviceDescription.productName: Smart Energy Plug In Switch PAN11-1

description.lang: Wenn die Leistungsaufnahme mehr als 5% schwankt sendet das PAN11 einen Meter Report. Wenn sich der An/Aus-Status ändert sendet das PAN11 einen Binary Switch Report.
When the power consumption of load vary over 5%, the PAN11 will send a Meter Report. When "on" or "off" state has been changed, it will send Binary Switch Report.
При изменении потребляемой мощности на 5% отправляется отчет. При изменении состояния (вкл/выкл) отправляется Binary Switch Report.

name.lang: Zeitinterval für einen automatischen Report des Stromverbrauches

description.lang: Wird ein Wert von 720 eingestellt, so meldet das PAN11 jede Stunde den momentan Stromverbrauch an den Z-Wave Controller. Einheit: 5 Sekunden
If the setting is configured for 1hour (set value =720), the PAN11 will report its instant power consumption every 1 hour to Z-Wave Controller. Unit: 5 seconds
Если установлено 1 час (значение = 720), то PAN11 будет отправлять отчеты о энергопотреблении раз в 1 час. Значение 1 = 5 секунд.

name.lang: Zeitinterval für einen automatischenReport der elektr. Arbeit (kWh)

description.lang: Wird ein Wert von 6 eingestellt, so meldet das PAN11 jede Stunde die innerhalb einer Stunde aufgenommen Leistung (KW*h) an den Z-Wave Controller.
If the setting is configured for 1hour (set value =6), the PAN11 will report its Accumulated Power Consumption (KW*h) every hour to Z-Wave Controller. Unit: 10min
Если установлено 1 час (значение = 6), то PAN11 будет отправлять отчет о суммарном энергопотреблении за весь период использования (КВт*Ч) раз в 1 час. Значение 1 = 10 минут.

name.lang: Threshold of Watt for Load caution
Threshold of Watt for Load caution

description.lang: Übersteigt die Wattleistung den hier festgelegten Wert, so sendet das PAN11 einen Alarm Report an den Z-Wave Controller.
This is a warning when the wattage of load over the preset threshold value, if the load wattage exceeds the setting value the PAN11 will send a warning alarm command to the controller.
Если мощность превысит указанное значение, на контроллер отправится команда Alarm.

name.lang: Threshold of KWh for Load caution

description.lang: Übersteigt die innerhalb einer Stunde aufgenommen Leistung den hier festgelegten Wert, so sendet das PAN11 einen Alarm Report an den Z-Wave Controller.
This is a warning when the KWh of load over the preset threshold value, if the Accumulated Power Consumption exceeds the setting value the PAN11 will send a warning alarm command to the controller.
Если суммарное энергопотребление за весь период использования (КВт*Ч) превысит указанное значение, на контроллер отправится команда Alarm.

This in-wall switch module is a transceiver which is a security enabled device which based on Z-Wave Plus technology.

deviceDescription.productName: In Wall Single relay(1 way) switch module

name.lang: Edge or Pulse mode or Edge-Toggle mode

description.lang: Select Edge or Pulse mode or Edge-Tog gle mode.
Select time interval for auto off function.

This plug-in ON/OFF switch PAN11 is a security enabled wireless switch, based on Z-Wave technology. This plug-in ON/OFF switch is able to detect current wattage and overload wattage of connected lights or appliances. When detecting overload state, the Switch will be disabled and its On/Off button will be lockout of which LED will flash quickly. However, unplug and re-connect the switch will reset its overload condition to normal status.

inclusionNote.lang: Pressing On/Off button three times within 2 seconds will enter inclusion mode.

description.lang: For group 1, the Switch will report its latest status to Z-Wave Controller. Grouping 1 includes, SWITCH_BINARY_REPORT, METER_REPORT, ALARM_REPORT.

If the setting is configured for 1hour (set value =720), the PAN11 will report its instant power consumption every 1 hour to Group1 node. The maximum interval to report its instant power consumption is 45 hours (5s*32767/3600=45hr).
Define the time interval to send a watt meter report.

If the setting is configured for 1hour (set value =6), the PAN11 will report its Accumulated Power Consumption (KW/h) every 1 hour to Group1 node. The maximum interval to report its Accumulated Power Consumption (KW/h) is 227.55 days (10min*32767/1440=227.55 days).
Define the time interval for the report.

name.lang: Threshold of current for Load caution

description.lang: This is a warning when the current of load over the preset threshold value, if the setting value is 1300, when the load current of Relay1 over this value, PAN11 will send current meter report to warn the Group1 node, the Range of the setting value is from 10 to 1300,and the default value is 1300. 1300*0.01A = 13A
Define the value of the treshold.

name.lang: Threshold of KWh for Load caution

description.lang: This is a warning when the KWh of load over the preset threshold value, If the setting value is 10000, when the Accumulated Power Consumption of Relay1 over this value, PAN11 will send KWH meter report to warn the Group1 node, minimum value is 1KWh and default value is 10000 kWh.
Define the value of the treshold.
Whenever the AC power return from lost, PAN11 will restore the switch state which could be SWITCH OFF、LAST SWITCH STATE、SWITCH ON. The default setting is LAST SWITCH STATE.
When the mode of switch On/Off is set to 0, any command of switch off will be disabled and the On/Off function of include button will be disabled. The default setting is enable mode.

Show Switch State：When switch is on, LED is on. When switch is off, LED is off. The default setting is Show Switch State.
Show Night mode：When switch is on, LED is off. When switch is off, LED is on.

Whenever PAN11 switches to on, the auto off timer begin to count down. After the timer decrease to zero, it will switch to off automatically. However if Auto off timer is set as 0, the auto off function will be disabled. The default setting is 0.
Define the time interval for auto off.
Whenever a switch off command, BASIC_SET 、BINARY_SWITCH_SET 、 SWITCH_ALL_OFF, is received, it could be interpreted as 4 variety of commands.
Dieser Schalteinsatz ermöglicht die Steuerung von zwei unabhängigen Verbrauchern sowohl drahtlos über Z-Wave als auch lokal.
This in-wall dual relay switch module is a transceiver which is a Z-Wave PlusTM enabled device.

inclusionNote.lang: dieses Gerät verwendet die autoinklusion oder kann mit einem einzelnen druck auf den ON/OFF-Knopf inkludiert werden.
this device works with autocinclusion or can be included by pushing the ON/OFF-button.

If the setting is configured for 1hour (set value =6), the PAN04 will report its
Setzt den zeitintervall wann ein Bericht gesendet werden soll z.B. 6*10min= 1 stunde.

wenn der controller die Kommandoklasse: Multi_Channel nicht verwendet muss eine jeweilige Kommandoklasse gewählt werden welche auf den zugriff auf das Relay reagiert.

If Controller not using Multi_Channel command class to access the relay of PAN04, you may configure the select value to react the Basic Command Class, Binary Switch Command Class or Meter Command Class V3.

This is a warning when the current of load over the preset threshold value, if the setting value is 750, when the load current of Relay1 or Relay2 over this value, PAN04 will send current meter report to the node of correspond Group, the Range of the setting value is from 10 to 750, and the default value is 750.

This is a warning when the KWh of load over the preset threshold value, If the setting value is 10000, when the Accumulated Power Consumption of Relay1 or Relay2 over this value, PAN04 will send KWh Meter Report command to the node of correspond Group, minimum value is 1KWh and default value is 10000
stellt die letzten bekannten Schaltermodi nach einem Stromausfall wieder her.
Restores the switch state setting in case the device was disconnected from the power source.
Jedes mal wenn das gerät eingeschaltet wird startet der timer und zählt runter. erreicht er 0 dann schaltet das gerät wieder ab.
Whenever the device switches to on, the auto off timer begin to count down. After the timer decrease to zero, it will switch off automatically.
Bestimmt den Zeitintervall für die Auto-Aus Funktion

Immer wenn das Gerät Befehle mit BASIC_SET 、BINARY_SWITCH_SET 、 SWITCH_ALL_OFF erhält wird das Gerät abgeschaltet.
Whenever a switch off command, BASIC_SET 、BINARY_SWITCH_SET 、 SWITCH_ALL_OFF, is received, it could be interpreted as 4 kinds of commands.
Die Multi-Channel Kommandoklasse ist ein guter weg beide relay´s unabhängig zu schalten. Der Endpoint 3 spricht dabei jedoch beide relay´s gleichzeitig an.

Multi-Channel Command is a good way to control relay1 and relay2 of PAN04 individually. The endpoint3 of PAN04 is related to both relay1 and relay2. In some condition it becomes redundant in Multi-Channel Command Class.
This in-wall switch module is a transceiver which is a Z-Wave PlusTM enabled deviceand is fully compatible with any Z-WaveTM enabled network.

description.lang: This plug-in ON/OFF switch PAN15 is a security enabled wireless switch, based on Z-Wave Plus technology. The plug-in ON/Off switch is able to detect current wattege and overload wattage of connected light or appliances. When detecting overload state, the switch will be disabled and its On/Off button will be lockout of which LED will falsh quickly. Each switch is designed to act as a repeater. Repeaters will re-transmit the RF signal to ensure that the signal is received by its intended destination by routing the signal around obstacles and radio dead spots.

inclusionNote.lang: Pressing On/Off button three times within 2 seconds will enter inclusion mode.

description.lang: Gruppe 1 ist für empfang der Reports wie ausgelöster Event, Temperatur, Helligkeit usw.
group 1 is for receiving the report message, like triggered event, temperature, illumination etc.
Для контроллера, которому отправляется информация о температуре, освещенности и срабатывании тампера
Gruppe 2 ist für Lichtsteuerung, das Gerät sendet “Basic Set” Kommandos zu dieser Gruppe
group 2 is for light control, the device will send the “Basic Set” command to this group.
Устройству отправляется BASIC SET при сработке датчика движения или датчика открытия

name.lang: Уровень диммирования, отправляемый устройствам из группы 2

description.lang: Setzt des Basic Command Wertes um Licht zu schalten
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light
Отправлять устройствам из группы 2 заданный уровень диммирования. Так можно при срабатывании датчика открытия или движения включить свет на 50% или открыть жалюзи на 30%.
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light
parameter to set the Sensitivity for the PIR (Passiv Infrared Sensor)
Настройка чувствительности датчика движения.1 - минимальная чувствительность, 99% - максимальная чувствительность
1 means the lowest sensitivity, 99 means the highest sensitivity
Grenzwert, bei dem das Licht bei ausgelöstem Event in Abhängigkeit von der Umgebungshelligkeit geschaltet wird
Setting the illumination threshold to turn on the light. When the event triggered and the environment illumination lower then the threshold, the device will turn on the light
При обнаружении движения проверяется уровень освещенности окружающей среды и если освещенность меньше заданной (т.е. темно), то свет включится. 1 - темно, 99 - ярко
0 bedeutet Helligkeitsabhängiges Einschalten deaktiviert; Licht nie einschalten.
0 means turn off illumination detected function And never turn on the light.
Отключить датчик движения, датчик открытия и проверку освещенность
Bit 0 und Bit 1 werden beeinflusst, wenn DIP-Schalter auf Programmier Modus steht. Wenn Bit 1 aktiviert, ist Bit 0 ohne Funktion
Bit0 and Bit1 will effect when the DIP Switch setting to program mode.If Bit1 is enabled, the Bit0 is useless.
Bit0 и Bit1 работают только если DIP переключатель установлен в режим программирования. Если Bit1 установлен, то Bit0 не используется
Bit0. 0 - Home Automation Modus; 1 - Security Modus
Bit0. 0 - Home Automation mode 1 - Security Mode
Bit0. 0 - Режим Домашней автоматизации; 1 - Режим Охраны
Bit3. 0 - Temperatur in Fahrenheit; 1 - Temperatur in Celsius
Bit3. 0 - Temperature in Fahrenheit; 1 - Temperature in Celsius
Bit3. 0 - Температура в Фаренгейтах; 1 - Температура в Цельсиях
Bit4. Deaktivieren des Beleuchtungs-Reports nach einem ausgelösten Event
Bit4. Disable illumination report after event triggered
Bit4. Отключить отчеты о освещенности при срабатывании датчика открытия или движения
Bit5. Deaktivieren des Temperatur-Reports nach einem ausgelösten Event
Bit5. Disable temperature report after event triggered
Bit5. Отключить отчеты о температуре при срабатывании датчика открытия или движения
Bit0. Не включать светодиод при сработке датчика открытия
Bit1. Не включать светодиод при сработке датчика движения
Bit2. Отключить магнит установленный в самом датчике
Bit3. Wenn Bit 2 is 0 (aktiviert), Gerät im gleichen Raum wie das zu schaltende Licht? 0: Im gleichen Raum (standard), 1: in anderem Raum
Bit3. When Bit2 is 0 (Enable), the device is install in the same room with the light? 0: In the same room(Default), 1: In the different room
Bit3. 0 - Датчик установлен в той же комнате, что и свет; 1 - Датчик установлен не в той комнате, что и свет. Если Bit2 = 1, эта функция не используется
Bit4. Deaktiviert die 5 sek Verzögerung zum Ausschalten des Lichts, wenn Tür/Fenster geschlossen
Bit4. Disable delay 5 seconds to turn off the light, when door/window closed
Bit4. Отключить задержку в 5 секунд при выключении света, когда дверь закрылась
Bit5. Deaktiviert automat. Abschaltung des Lichts, nachdem Tür/Fenster geöffnet und Licht angeschaltet wurde. Wenn Bit 2 auf 0, dann ist diese Einstellung ohne Funktion
Bit5. Disable auto turn off the light, after door/window opened to turn on the light. If Bit2 = 0, this setting is useless
Bit5. Не выключать свет после того, когда сработал датчик открытия и включил свет. Если Bit2 = 0, эта функция не используется

Bit6. Aktiviert Temperatur Messung. Wenn aktiviert wird bei Temperaturänderung von 3° ein Temperatur-Report gesendet. Ebenfalls wird ein Temperatur-Report (aller 64 Sekunden) gesendet, wenn diese über 140° Fahrenheit steigt

Bit6. Enable temperature monitoring. When this bit enable, the temperature changed 3 degree Fahrenheit, it will report. And also the temperature over 140 degree Fahrenheit, it will report every 64 seconds
Bit6. При изменении температуры на 3 ° присылать отчет. При температуре больше 60 °C отчет присылается каждые 64 секунды

name.lang: PIR Intervall Zeit für erneutes Erkennen
Время бездействия датчика после обнаружения движения

description.lang: Im Security Modus, nach Erkennung des Bewegungssensors, festlegen der Zeit zum erneuten Erkennen
In the security mode, after the PIR motion detected, setting the re-detect time

После обнаружения движения датчик отключается на время указанное в этом параметре. Время бездействия датчика задается с шагом 8 секунд, т.е. 1 = 8 секунд, 3 = 24 секунд. Если значение времени бездействия больше чем в параметре 9, тогда это время на которое будет отключен датчик движения после выключения света
8 Sekunden pro Tick, minimale Verzögerung 24 Sekunden (3 Ticks = 24 Sekunden).
8 seconds per tick, and minimum time is 24 seconds, default tick is 3 (24 seconds).
Nach Aktivieren der Beleuchtung, Verzögerung bis Beleuchtung wieder deaktiviert wird
After turn on the light, setting the delay time to turn off the light when the PIR motion is not detected

Время через которое датчик движения отправит команду выключения (после того как датчик отправил команду включения и не было движения). Каждое движение сбрасывает время на начало. Время выключения задается с шагом 8 секунд, т.е. 1 = 8 секунд, 4 = 32 секунд
8 Sekunden pro Tick, minimal 32 Sekunden, Standard 4 Ticks = 32 Sekunden
8 seconds per tick, and minimum time is 32 seconds, default tick is 4 (32 seconds)
Intervall-Zeit für automatischen Report des Batterie-Status
interval time for auto report the battery level
Время задается с шагом 30 минут, т.е. 1 = 30 минут, 12 = 6 часов
30 Minuten pro Tick, minimal 30 Minuten, Standard sind 12 Ticks = 6 Stunden
30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)

name.lang: Время автоматического отчета о состоянии датчика двери/окна

description.lang: Intervall-Zeit für automatischen Report des Tür/Fenster-Status
interval time for auto report the door/window state
Время задается с шагом 30 минут, т.е. 1 = 30 минут, 12 = 6 часов
30 Minuten pro Tick, minmal 30 Minuten, Standard sind 12 Ticks = 6 Stunden
30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)
Intervall-Zeit für automatischen Report des Temperatur-Status
interval time for auto report the temperature
Время задается с шагом 30 минут, т.е. 1 = 30 минут, 12 = 6 часов
30 Minuten pro Tick, minimal 30 Minuten, Standard 12 Ticks = 6 Stunden
30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)
Intervall-Zeit für automatischen Report des Temperatur-Status
interval time for auto report the temperature
Время задается с шагом 30 минут, т.е. 1 = 30 минут, 12 = 6 часов
30 Minuten pro Tick, minimal 30 Minuten, Standard 12 Ticks = 6 Stunden
30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)
Der kleine Multisensor PST02 verügt über einen Tür-/ Fenstersensor, einen Bewegungs-, Licht- und Temperatursensor.
The slim multisensor PST02 has PIR, door/window, temperature and illumination, 4 sensors function in one,based on Z-Wave technology.

wakeupNote.lang: Um das Gerät zu wecken müssen Sie das Front-Cover entfernen und den Schalter 1x betätigen.
If the user want to wake-up the device immediately, please remove the front cover, and press the tamper key once. The device will wake-up 10 seconds.

inclusionNote.lang: Betätigen Sie den Schalter 3x schnell um die Inklusion zu starten.
Pressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.

description.lang: The group 2 is for light control, the device will send the “Basic Set” command to this group.
The group 1 is for receiving the report message, like triggered event, temperature, illumination etc.
Setzt das Basiskommando um das Licht ein zuschalten(-1) bzw. zu dimmen (1-100). Der Wert 0 schaltet das Licht aus.
Setting the BASIC command value to turn on the light. The 0xFF(-1) means turn on the light. For dimmer equipment 1 to 100 means the light strength. 0 means turn off the light.
Definiert die Empfindlichkeit des PIR Sensors. Eine Hohe Empfindlichkeit bedeutet das auch auf höhere Entfernungen noch ausgelöst werden kann. Dies ist jedoch von der jeweiligen Umgebung abhängig.

PIR sensitivity settings. 0 means disable the PIR motion. 1 means the lowest sensitivity, 99 means the highest sensitivity. High sensitivity means can detected long distance, but if there is more noise signal in the environment, it will re-trigger too frequency.
Bestimmt den Grenzwert wann Licht eingeschaltet bzw. ein Event ausgelöst werden soll.

Setting the illumination threshold to turn on the light. When the event triggered and the environment illumination lower then the threshold, the device will turn on the light. 0 means turn off illumination detected function. And never turn on the light. 1 means darkest. 99 means brightest. 100 means turn off illumination detected function. And always turn on the light. Notice: In none test mode, only the value in 1 to 99 will enable the illumination detected function and update the illumination value.
Verwenden Sie die bits um die Einstellungen festzulegen.
Operation mode. Using bit to control.

1 =enable test mode
0 = disable normal mode
Notice: This bit only effect by the DIP Switch setting to program mode.

Setting the temperature scale.
0: Fahrenheit
1: Celsius
Disable the illumination report after event triggered.
Disable the temperature report after event triggered.
Disable the back key release into test mode.
Multisensor function switch. Using bit to control.
Disable magnetic integrate PIR (Default is Disable)

When Bit2 is 0 (Enable), Are the device and the lighting in the same room?
0: In the same room (Default)
1: In a different room.
Notice: If this bit is 1, it is recommended also set the Bit1 to 1, cause the PIR triggered, doesn't mean the people in that room.
Disable delay 5 seconds to turn off the light, when door/window closed.

Disable auto turn off the light, after door/window opened to turn on the light.
If bit2 is zero, this setting is useless.
Notice: If the configuration No.9 is zero, this setting is useless.
Customer function switch, using bit control.

Enable sending motion OFF report.
Note: Depends on the Bit4
0: Report Notification CC, Type: 0x07, Event: 0xFE 1: Sensor Binary Report, Type: 0x0C, Value: 0x00
Enable don't send out BASIC OFF after door closed.

Notification Type
0: Using Notification Report. 1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
Disable Multi CC in auto report.
Disable to report battery state when the device triggered.

In the normal mode, after the PIR motion detected, setting the re-detect time. 8 seconds per tick, default tick is 3 (24 seconds). Setting the suitable value to prevent received the trigger signal too frequency. Also can save the battery energy. Notice: If this value bigger than the configuration setting NO. 9. There is a period after the light turned off and the PIR not start detecting.

After turn on the lighting, setting the delay time to turn off the lighting when the PIR motion is not detected. 8 seconds per tick, default tick is 4 (32 seconds). 0 means never send turn off light command.
The turn off light command is disabled.
The interval time for auto report the battery level. 0 means turn off auto report battery. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.
Define the time interval for a battery auto report.

name.lang: Auto Report Door/Windo w State Time

description.lang: The interval time for auto report the door/window state. 0 means turn off auto report door/window state. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.
The interval time for auto report the illumination. 0 means turn off auto report illumination. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.
The interval time for auto report the temperature. 0 means turn off auto report temperature. The default value is 12. The tick time can setting by the configuration No.20.
The interval time for auto report each tick. Setting this configuration will effect configuration No.10, No.11, No.12 and No.13. Caution: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function.
All auto report functions are disabled.

The temperature differential to report. 0 means turn off this function. The unit is Fahrenheit. Enable this function the device will detect every minutes. And when the temperature is over 140 degree Fahrenheit, it will continue report. Enable this functionality will cause some issue please see the detail in the “Temperature Report” section.
Define the temperature differential to report.

The illumination differential to report.q2121111 0 means turn off this function. The unit is percentage. Enable this function the device will detect every minutes. Enable this functionality will cause some issue please see the detail in the “Illumination Report” section.
Define the illumination differential to report.
The Smoke Sensor PSG01 is designed to give early warning of developing fires by giving off the alarm sounds from its build-in alarm horn, based on Z-Wave technology.

wakeupNote.lang: Press the button once. The device will wake-up 10 seconds.

inclusionNote.lang: Pressing button three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.

description.lang: This group is for receiving the report message, like triggered event etc.
Customer function switch, using bit control.
Notification Type, 0: Using Notification Report. 1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
Defines the interval time for auto reporting the battery level.
Define time interval for auto report.
The flood multisensor PAT02-1A has flood, temperature and humidity, 3 sensors function in one, based on Z-Wave technology.

description.lang: The group 2 is for the light control, the device will send the “Basic Set” command to this group.
The group 1 is for receiving the report message, like triggered event, temperature, humidity etc.
Setting the BASIC command value. When the flood trigger off, send the BASIC CC to the group 2.
Setting the BASIC command value. When the flood trigger on, send the BASIC CC to the group 2.
Operation mode. Using bit to control.
Disable the temperature report after event triggered. (1:Disable, 0:Enable)
Multisensor function switch. Using bit to control.
Disable the humidity report after event triggered. (1:Disable, 0:Enable)
Customer function switch, using bit control.

inclusionNote.lang: 1. In the menu of the heatapp! gateway select the menu item "Register / deregister" under "radio Modules" and then "Register". You are requested to press the learn key (10) on the heatapp! floor. (See also the operating instructions at www.heatapp.de). 2. Press the learn key (10) for 2 seconds (see also section "Functions of the learn key", line "b"). 3. As soon as the heatapp! gateway detects the heatapp! floor, you will be requested to enter a name (e.g. Ground floor). 4. Check in the menu of the heatapp! gateway under " radio Modules ", whether the heatapp! floor has been successfully registered or deregistered.

Elektronisches Thermostat mit drahtloser Kommunikation über Z-Wave. Das Thermostat kann sowohl Boden- und Raumsensoren, Raumsensoren mit Maximaldruckbegrenzer im Boden sowie 2 externe Sensoren steuern als auch als Leistungsregler verwendet werden. In allen diesen Modi kann das Thermostat einer Ladung von 16A/3600W standhalten.

Electronic thermostat with wireless communication via Z-Wave. The thermostat can control a floor sensor,a room sensor, a rooms sensor with a max limitor in the floor, 2 external sensors and also be used as a power regulator. In all of these modes the thermostat can withstand a load of 16A/3600W.

inclusionNote.lang: Drücken Sie Taste 3 bis das Gerät eingeschalten ist. Dann bestätigen Sie mit Taste 2. Achten Sie auf das Inclusionexclusion-Symbol zur Bestätigung. Sobald das Gerät im Gateway hinzugefügt ist, wird "Inc" oder "Ecl" auf dem Bildschirm angezeigt. Bei Verbindungsfehler wird "Err" angezeigt.

Press button 3 till you see On. Then confirm with button 2. Look for the inclusion\exclusion symbol for confirmation. When added in gateway, Inc or Ecl will appear on the screen. If pairing fails, Err will appear.

deviceDescription.productName: Multireg Z-Wave electronic thermostat with 4 functions

description.lang: On/Off Control: This group defines the group of Z-Wave units that the thermostat controls. Control is done with BASIC_SET commands, thus all switching units can be used as auxiliary heating controllers.
Lifeline: This group is the ‘Lifeline’ group that all reporting is sent to. Generally gateway address is assigned to this group.

description.lang: Die Leuchte kann per Funk ausgeschaltet werden, auch wenn der Wandschalter in der An-Position bleibt Durch kurzes Ausschalten und Wieder-Einschalten kann die Leuchte dann auch vom Wandschalter aus eingeschaltet werden. The Bulb can be turned off wirelessly while the powerswitch on the wall remains in on-position. The bulb can be turned back on from the wall switch by shortly turning of and then turning on again This parameter defines the status of the bulb after such an operation
